record.dc:title: 131HA2 Davis Site 6HA2, Hamilton County, Tennessee. Burial 6HA2, Showing coverstones.
record.wpa:narrative: [Feature 5] This is the first stone cist found in this excavation. See burial data form 6HA2. [Burial 6HA2] 6HA2 lies in a rectangular cist of limestone slabs (Feature 5). The sides of the cist are formed of slabs set on edge. Four long, narrow slabs were laid across the slabs which form the sides, and above these were laid a number of additional flat rocks which served to seal the crevices.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs 130HA2 [fhm00773], 132HA2 [fhm00775], 165HA2 [fhm00781], 166HA2 [fhm00782], and 168HA2 [fhm00784].
